About Me

I am Laxmi Narayan, a data-driven innovator with a passion for Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
Currently, a second-year student pursuing B.Tech CSAIML at PSIT Kanpur, one of the leading engineering colleges in India.
I thrive on completing online courses and projects in various AI and ML domains, such as computer vision, natural language processing, and deep learning.
I am proficient in Python, C, and MYSQL, and have a strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and mathematics.
I am a creative thinker with excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
I am always eager to explore new AI applications and learn from others in the field.
